block.text:
Welcome to the world of perils, Adventurer!
 You have been wandering around these lands since you left your Masters. You are not stopping for more than resting a few days all through the journey. Mostly at shrines where you can rest undisturbed, as at the one you're at now.
You know some of the dangers that await, but no one can tell what lays ahead. Your guts sense the watching eyes in the surrounding world, telling you: Be careful with your steps!
 You're lucky enough to have a world map at your disposal. Look out for nearby populations. Be aware that some of the races will not tolerate your presence around themselves.
 Explore the lands, overcome your enemies, seek fortune and fame, or whatever you care for.
 Fulfill your destiny!

Keyboard/Mouse Tutorial

 Use W and S to move forward and backwards. Use A and S to turn left and right. Use Q and E for strafe movement.
Press Right mouse button while walking to toggle between pointer and mouselook. Use pointer mode mouse to access the menus and windows. You can click on the upper buttons or on the portraits.
Left clicking on the character portraits brings up Inventory, use right click for Character Sheet. If you find a chest use upper Search button for inspecting it. Use Inventory to attach ammo to weapons or equip armors.
Save often. Use F10 to quickly access Main Menu, F12 for creating screenshots.

 Report bugs at jClassicRPG forum or the sf.net bugtracker. Thanks!
